tool_description: No-fuss on the edge IP address retrieval. Locate your client's IP address the easy way.
name: IP Address
title: IP Address

api_list.name: Get IP
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ip-address4.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ip-address4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ip-address4.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ip-address4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
